headline: HCA Announces Proposed Public Offering of Senior Notes
summary: NASHVILLE, Tenn., October 27, 2025--HCA Healthcare, Inc. (NYSE: HCA) today announced that its wholly owned subsidiary, HCA Inc., proposes to offer senior notes, subject to market and other considerations. Actual terms of the senior notes, including maturity, interest rate and principal amount, will depend on market conditions at the time of pricing. HCA Inc. intends to use the net proceeds from this offering for general corporate purposes, which may include the repayment of outstanding borrowing

raw.headline: HCA Announces Proposed Public Offering of Senior Notes
raw.summary: NASHVILLE, Tenn., October 27, 2025--HCA Healthcare, Inc. (NYSE: HCA) today announced that its wholly owned subsidiary, HCA Inc., proposes to offer senior notes, subject to market and other considerations. Actual terms of the senior notes, including maturity, interest rate and principal amount, will depend on market conditions at the time of pricing. HCA Inc. intends to use the net proceeds from this offering for general corporate purposes, which may include the repayment of outstanding borrowing

headline: HCA raises 2025 guidance, but eyes looming headwinds
summary: The for-profit operator's guidance raise is "cautious," one analyst said. Still, HCA is staring down challenges like the potential expiration of more generous Affordable Care Act subsidies.

raw.headline: HCA raises 2025 guidance, but eyes looming headwinds
